solution_line_template: Billy has already run {billy_miles_so_far} miles because {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} plus plus {miles_per_day_billy_early} equals {billy_miles_so_far}

Tiffany has already run {tiffany_miles_so_far} miles because {miles_per_day_tiffany_early} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_early} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_early} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_late} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_late} plus {miles_per_day_tiffany_late} equals <<{miles_per_day_tiffany_early}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_early}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_early}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_late}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_late}+{miles_per_day_tiffany_late}={tiffany_miles_so_far}>>{tiffany_miles_so_far}
Billy has to run {miles_billy_needs_to_run} mile to tie Tiffany because {tiffany_miles_so_far} minus {billy_miles_so_far} equals {miles_billy_needs_to_run}.
